title: The Digital Environment - Information about Australia's Culture and New Technologies
description: This CD provides an information resource about the intersection of new technologies and cultural activities including: web-publishing, copyright, interoperability, digitisation and other aspects of the Internet age.  Extensive video, reports, discussion papaers, glossaries and other material are available on the CD. There is a powerful index to search thense resources, and it contains hyperlinks to quickly access documents on the Web if your computer has an Internet connection.
related_objects: Collection; B1004014; PAML pilot project collection; Active; 01 Sep 2000-01 Dec 2000
